infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to take photos of your products.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to select product images.

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you share them with your friends.
plugins.cameraPermission: The app accesses your camera to let you take photos to share with your friends.
